${ModID}:TheRod.NAME: The Rod
${ModID}:TheRod.FLAVOR: The only one of its kind. Glows in the dark.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to #b0 this combat.

${ModID}:RainbowRod.NAME: Rainbow Rod
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL At the start of combat, reduce the cost of cards in your hand to #b0 this combat.

${ModID}:BrokenOar.NAME: Broken Oar
${ModID}:BrokenOar.FLAVOR: Most trips to the Spire are one-way.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yExhaust 1 card and gain [E].

${ModID}:MaelstromAnkh.NAME: Maelstrom Ankh
${ModID}:MaelstromAnkh.FLAVOR: Ozone and sea salt... 'tis a fine day for fishing.

${ModID}:UnageeSkull.NAME: Unagee Skull
${ModID}:UnageeSkull.FLAVOR: Resembles the serpents that sink Spire-bound ships.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 #yFish into your hand.

${ModID}:Signpost.NAME: Signpost
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play a #yPower card each combat, gain #b

${ModID}:Goggles.NAME: Terracotta Scale
${ModID}:Goggles.FLAVOR: Hard and dense. The red glaze has all but chipped away.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you end your turn with an empty hand, gain #b1 #yStrength.

${ModID}:Newsletter.NAME: Newsletter
${ModID}:Newsletter.FLAVOR: "Peculiar! A shimmering cube of false promises." - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: The merchant's cards are #y${ModID}:Foil, #yUpgraded, and #b25% off.

${ModID}:OldBobber.NAME: Old Bobber
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 Colorless cards in a single turn, deal #b7 damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:LuckyRing.NAME: Lucky Ring
${ModID}:LuckyRing.FLAVOR: The eye blinks just when you start to look away.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 2nd turn, draw #b1 card and gain [E] [E] .

${ModID}:ExpulsionLetter.NAME: Final Results
${ModID}:ExpulsionLetter.FLAVOR: Excommunicated, exiled, expunged - but you can still fix your gaze on the horizon.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add an #yUpgraded #y${ModID}:Foil #yMiracle, #ySmite, and #ySafety into your hand.

${ModID}:OtherBoot.NAME: Other Boot
DESCRIPTIONS: Protects from #yThorns and #ySharp #yHide. Whenever you play a #yBoot, gain #b6 #yBlock.

${ModID}:FishOPedia.NAME: Fish-o-Pedia
${ModID}:FishOPedia.FLAVOR: Tattered, nibbled, organized by depth. The last entry was torn out entirely.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #y${ModID}:Quest: Play #b4 different kinds of #y${ModID}:Fish. #yReward: Gain #b2 #yStrength.

${ModID}:MonsterManual.NAME: Monster Manual
${ModID}:MonsterManual.FLAVOR: One of the oldest known books in print.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a #yParty #yMember into your hand.
